bibl.bibl: Ross, John. 1835. Narrative of a second voyage in search of a North-west passage: and of a residence in the Arctic regions during the years 1829, 1830, 1831, 1832, 1833: including the reports of Commander, now Captain, James Clark Ross, R.N., F.R.S., F.L.S., &c. and the discovery of the Northern Magnetic Pole. London: A. W. Webster.
